StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: Wow, that was close. Oh, that must be the men’s bath! Here we go.
[Robby enters the men’s locker area.]
ROBBY: Good, no one here either.
AI: Excuse me! Oh, there you are.
[Robby turns to see Ai enter the locker room.]
ROBBY: Ai, what are you doing? This is the men’s bath.
AI: You're crazy! I just saw you run out of the women’s bath.
ROBBY: That must have been another foreigner wearing a bathing suit. Look, you should get out of here before someone . . .
AI: No one’s here yet. Let's have a swimming contest!

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: Are you crazy? You know what they’d do to me if they found out?

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: ROBBY: I don’t know either, but . . .

StoryElement.StoryElement: [An old man enters with a young woman. The four stare at each other.]
OLD MAN: Hey, you’re not allowed to bring a girl in here!
ROBBY: She followed me!
[The man didn't believe Robby so Robby bolts out of the locker room and runs down the hall.]
ROBBY: Gotta get out of here! Oh there’s a green sign with a man escaping. I’ll follow him!
[Robby pushes the exit door open into the balmy night air.]

I’m just gonna run until I reach the nearest harbor. Hop on a ship or . . . whatever! I’ll swim! I’ll swim to Thailand! No, stop thinking about Thailand. How do I get out of this picturesque Japanese garden? Oh wow, bonsai! Ow!
[Robby wacks his head on a low hanging branch. Robby point of view changes so that he’s looking up straight up at the stars. His focus goes in and out.]
ROBBY: Oh my head!
[A figure stands over him. It’s a woman but she’s not in focus yet.]
MARIKO: Robby?
ROBBY: Mariko? I was looking for . . . the pool.
[Robby’s consciousness fades and he blacks out.]
